<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsection">MCSection</a> &#42;PPC64LinuxTargetObjectFile::SelectSectionForGlobal(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject">GlobalObject</a> &#42;GO, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionkind">SectionKind</a> Kind, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &amp;TM)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Here override ReadOnlySection to DataRelROSection for PPC64 SVR4 ABI</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// when we have a constant that contains global relocations.  This is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// necessary because of this ABI&#39;s handling of pointers to functions in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a shared library.  The address of a function is actually the address</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of a function descriptor, which resides in the .opd section.  Generated</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// code uses the descriptor directly rather than going via the GOT as some</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// other ABIs do, which means that initialized function pointers must</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reference the descriptor.  The linker must convert copy relocs of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pointers to functions in shared libraries into dynamic relocations,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// because of an ordering problem with initialization of copy relocs and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// PLT entries.  The dynamic relocation will be initialized by the dynamic</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// linker, so we must use DataRelROSection instead of ReadOnlySection.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For more information, see the description of ELIMINATE&#95;COPY&#95;RELOCS in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// GNU ld.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/lltok/#af353621f14cb4b4b3af5ffaff84076b1">Kind</a>.isReadOnly()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;GVar = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;GlobalVariable&gt;</a>(GO);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (GVar &amp;&amp; GVar-&gt;isConstant() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="normal">        GVar-&gt;getInitializer()-&gt;needsDynamicRelocation())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/lltok/#af353621f14cb4b4b3af5ffaff84076b1">Kind</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionkind/#a3d239dea51a80324a3ce44985ed41dd4">SectionKind::getReadOnlyWithRel</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
